sentences.en: Barry had his nose put out of joint by Lucy's aloof sophistication.
sentences.cn: 露西的冷淡与世故使得巴里十分不快。

sentences.en: Despite her scruffy clothes, there was an air of sophistication about her.
sentences.cn: 尽管她衣衫褴褛, 但神态老练世故.

sentences.en: He carried out this prerquisite with skill and sophistication.
sentences.cn: 他把前提工作搞得巧妙周密.

sentences.en: He combined curious qualities of naivete with incisive wit and worldly sophistication.
sentences.cn: 他把天真质朴的奇怪品质同锐利的机智和老练的世故结合了起来.

sentences.en: He felt people were contemptuous of his lack of sophistication.
sentences.cn: 他觉得人们看不起他不懂人情世故.

sentences.en: It would take many decades to build up the level of education and sophistication required.
sentences.cn: 要花好几十年的时间来逐步达到所需要的教育和发展水平。

sentences.en: Jack London Californian, has even more energy and rather less sophistication.
sentences.cn: 杰克、伦敦、加利福尼亚的精力更加充沛,但不通达人情世故.

sentences.en: James Bond is known for his sophistication, his style and his sense of class.
sentences.cn: 举止优雅、风度翩翩且派头十足是詹姆斯·邦德一贯的形象。

sentences.en: Maturity and emotional sophistication can't be faked.
sentences.cn: 成熟和情感上的老道是装不出来的。

sentences.en: Maureen was the epitome of sophistication.
sentences.cn: 莫琳是个典型的老油条。

sentences.en: Subsequent individual monographs will proceed at increasing levels of sophistication.
sentences.cn: 此后几集将继续提高论述水平.

sentences.en: The decor has a cool sophistication.
sentences.cn: 这种装潢设计很是复杂精细.

sentences.en: The latter system needs a great deal of sophistication and computing.
sentences.cn: 后一种系统需作大量的改进和计算.

sentences.en: These actors and directors brought a new sophistication and slickness to modern theatre.
sentences.cn: 这些演员和导演为现代戏剧带来了新的高超技巧。

sentences.en: Well, who gives a toss about sophistication anyway?
sentences.cn: 嗯，不管怎样，谁会在意高雅时髦呢？

sentences.en: With increasing technological sophistication, this factor continues to grow.
sentences.cn: 随着技术水平的不断发展, 这个因素还将继续增长.

words.tran_cn: 复杂的；精致的；久经世故的；富有经验的
使变得世故；使迷惑；篡改（sophisticate的过去分词形式）
弄复杂；使变得世故；曲解
复杂；诡辩；老于世故；有教养

trans.tran_cn: 老练，精明，强词夺理，诡辩，伪品，掺杂品，有教养，复杂巧妙，高水平
trans.tran_en: The sophistication of people, places, machines, or methods is their quality of being sophisticated
